switch.name: z-position-left-ski
switch.test: simulation/sim-time-sec GT 0.25 bushkit EQ 4 gear/unit[1]/broken EQ 0

switch.name: z-position-right-ski

switch.name: z-position-left-ski-lite
switch.test: simulation/sim-time-sec GT 0.25 bushkit EQ 5 ski-damage/left-ski EQ 0

switch.name: z-position-right-ski-lite
switch.test: simulation/sim-time-sec GT 0.25 bushkit EQ 5 ski-damage/right-ski EQ 0
